name: Extreme Rodent's Revenge
description:
Something quick and silly I made to procrastinate on other projects. A remake of the old DOS game, Rodent's Revenge. 

The goal on each level is to avoid the cats and push blocks around to trap them. Once a cat is trapped and fully surrounded by blocks, they'll go to sleep. When all the cats on the floor are asleep they'll disappear and drop Pizza. Grab Pizza to gain points.

Arrow keys to move and push blocks

Escape/Backspace to pause the game
